element.default: /* This optional script is run at the beginning of a challenge. It is useful when you need to prepare an environment before the challenger begins their work. */
element.label: Environment Setup Script
element.name: environment_setup_script

element.default: /* This script is used to create an obstacle for the challenger. Typically this involves creating an incident or a setting up a failing indicator of some kind. If needed, the PlayerStatus variable contains glide record of the corresponding Player Status record (x_snc_cfac_player_status). This is useful when creating tasks that require an assigned_to value, using PlayerStatus.player_user. */
element.label: Obstacle Creation Script
element.name: obstacle_creation_script

element.default:
/* You may optionally add a script here to determine if the obstacle need not be created and/or award points for this prevention. To indicate prevention, set the Prevented variable to true. */
Prevented = false;
element.label: Obstacle Prevention Script
element.name: obstacle_prevention_script
